content.umami: We use the Umami service for analytics. This happens completely anonymously and does require any cookies. Further info: {analyticsLink}.

cookies.content: The application does not use cookies to store your data. Your answers and preferences are stored in your browser’s local storage for a better user experience. This data can only be accessed by your device, not by the application’s publisher.
cookies.title: Cookies

platform.umami: We use the Umami service for data collection. It does not employ cookies. Further info: {analyticsLink}.

dataConsentIntro.denied: You have denied data collection {consentDate, date, ::yyyyMMd}. You can change your preference below.
dataConsentIntro.granted: You have consented to data collection {consentDate, date, ::yyyyMMd}.  You can change your preference below.
dataConsentIntro.indetermined: You can consent to or deny data collection by choosing one of the options below.

dataConsentLabel.denied: I don’t want to share my data
dataConsentLabel.granted: Yes, I agree to share my data
